<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Crawling Hand](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2885)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

A crawling hand formed from the appendage of a Medium creature is quick and agile, skittering in the shadows until it can strike its prey.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=46)): DC 13

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 8
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Crawling_Hand.webp" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature -1">[Crawling Hand](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2885)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Tiny" />
<trait label="Undead" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=722" />
<trait label="Unholy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=521" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 68 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +5; [lifesense](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=67) 30 feet, [tremorsense](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=82) ([imprecise](/Rules.aspx?ID=412)) 30 feet

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1); (can't speak any language)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +5, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +6, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +2

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +1

**Dex** +3

**Con** +0

**Int** -4

**Wis** +0

**Cha** +0
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 12 

**Fort** +2 

**Ref** +5 

**Will** +2 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 8
([void healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=83))

</row>

**Immunities**
bleed, [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=571) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=578), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=85), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=669), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=95), [visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=727)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet, climb 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +7 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [reach 0 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=684)),
**Damage** 1d4+1 slashing plus Throat Grab

**Mark Quarry**   A crawling hand can be assigned a quarry by anointing the hand with a drop of the intended quarry's blood. If the hand ever has no quarry, it automatically gains the next creature it damages as its quarry. The hand gains a +1 circumstance bonus to Perception checks when it [Seeks](/Actions.aspx?ID=2301) its quarry, to [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=49) checks when it [Tracks](/Actions.aspx?ID=2408) its quarry, and to damage rolls when it Strikes its quarry.

**Throat Grab** <actions string="Single Action" />  This ability functions as [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=45), but the crawling hand grips the throat of a Medium or smaller creature. A creature [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=77) or [restrained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=90) this way has difficulty speaking and must spend an extra action to perform any action that requires speaking, including casting spells.

</column>

name: Crawling Hand
